Bash(git -C /home/runner/workspace commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix newsfeed not posting market close summaries

The scheduler was calling a non-existent API endpoint \(/api/market-summary,
404\) instead of the correct one \(/api/markets/summary\). Also widened the
posting window from 30 minutes to rest-of-day and added a startup catch-up
check so summaries aren''t lost when the server sleeps through market close.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /home/runner/workspace commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix portfolio stats calculations and instant save

- Compute Total Value, Total Gain, and Day Change from live enriched
  FMP data instead of the stale /api/portfolio/stats endpoint \(which
  used DB-cached prices and hardcoded dayChange to 0\)
- Delete holdings instantly instead of 5-second delayed save
- Remove unused ToastAction import and stats query invalidations

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
